metadata.title: CVE-2020-16145 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Roundcube Webmail before 1.3.15 and 1.4.8 allows stored XSS in HTML messages during message display via a crafted SVG document. This issue has been fixed in 1.4.8 and 1.3.15.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-16145` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-core - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.11+dfsg.1-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.11+dfsg.1-4').
